column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////While the bone in filet was great and cooked perfectly
column2: I honestly didn't think it was that amazing. I've definitely had much better
column4: too. The meat was nice and tender
column5: but it by no means blew me away. I guess it's safe to say that I was expecting a lot more
column6: especially at the price point. That being said
column7: it was still a solid piece of meat.
